attributes.action: Tell us why the Exeter GIC has only seen 2 patients in a year
attributes.background: Investigate The GIC in Exeter where is the money going that is set aside for transgender people to be seen

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You can find out how to complain about NHS services here:
https://www.nhs.uk/using-the-nhs/about-the-nhs/how-to-complain-to-the-nhs/
